div.div: Carroll University vs. Lake Forest College
at Lake Forest, Ill. | Farwell Field

tr.td: Lake Forest wins coin toss, defers, and will defend east end zone.
Jon Gurchak kickoff 57 yards to the CU8, Evan Whaley return 17 yards to the CU25 (John Dillon).
Tyler Schovanec pass complete to Corey Nelson for 5 yards to the CU30 (Ed Dobernig;Bryce Jones).
Andy Laurin rush for 9 yards to the CU39, 1ST DOWN CU, out-of-bounds (Joey Kropp;John Dillon).
Tyler Schovanec pass complete to Corey Nelson for 9 yards to the CU48 (John Preston).
Lamont Williams rush for 1 yard to the CU49, 1ST DOWN CU (John Dillon;John Preston).
Lamont Williams rush for 1 yard to the 50 yardline, fumble forced by Ramel Samuel, fumble by Lamont Williams recovered by LFC Pat Clark at LFC47.
LAKE FOREST COLLEGE drive start at 12:57.
Mike Lewis pass complete to Mike Rantis for 53 yards to the CU0, 1ST DOWN LFC, TOUCHDOWN, clock 12:49.
Jon Gurchak kickoff 56 yards to the CU9, Evan Whaley return 19 yards to the CU28 (Alex Pasiewicz;John Dillon).
Tyler Schovanec rush for 7 yards to the CU35 (John Dillon).
Tyler Schovanec pass complete to Andy Laurin for 6 yards to the CU41, 1ST DOWN CU, out-of-bounds (Ed Dobernig).
Tyler Schovanec pass incomplete to Lamont Williams (John Preston).
Lamont Williams rush for 2 yards to the CU43 (Jake Rotkvich).
Tyler Schovanec pass complete to Matt Sklander for 8 yards to the LFC49, 1ST DOWN CU (Ed Dobernig).
Lamont Williams rush for loss of 3 yards to the CU48 (TaylorHolzmeyer;John Dillon).
Tyler Schovanec pass complete to Daniel Arden for 2 yards to the 50 yardline (Nick Waters).
Tyler Schovanec sacked for loss of 6 yards to the CU44 (TaylorHolzmeyer).
Matt Traub punt 39 yards to the LFC17, Joey Kropp return 28 yards to the LFC45 (Daniel Timmers).
LAKE FOREST COLLEGE drive start at 08:17.
Alec Howe rush for 5 yards to the 50 yardline (Michael Sahli;Grant Nass).
Mike Lewis pass incomplete to Willie McIntyre.
Mike Lewis sacked for loss of 8 yards to the LFC42 (Dillon Fasse).
Jon Gurchak punt 26 yards to the CU32, downed.
Lamont Williams rush for no gain to the CU32 (M.GarettoBalmer;Blake Waller).
Tyler Schovanec pass complete to J. Butterfield for 11 yards to the CU43, 1ST DOWN CU (Nick Waters).
Tyler Schovanec rush for 5 yards to the CU48, out-of-bounds.
Tyler Schovanec pass incomplete to J. Butterfield (Nick Waters).

Lamont Williams rush for 3 yards to the LFC34 (Jordan Cruz).
Lamont Williams rush for loss of 1 yard to the LFC35 (Jordan Cruz;John Dillon).
Matt Traub punt 35 yards to the LFC0, touchback.

Tyler Schovanec pass complete to Lamont Williams for 4 yards to the CU37 (M.GarettoBalmer;Ramel Samuel).
